thread.title: Driver's parking fine overturned as space was too small
thread.title_full: Driver's parking fine overturned as space was too small | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Driver's parking fine overturned as space was too small
text:
Modern cars are getting bigger while parking spaces have stayed the same.
But a Hampshire driver has proved some parking bays at Southampton Central railway station are far too small and has managed to get a parking fine overturned.
Naval architect, Jago Lawless, was furious when he was given an Â£80 penalty because his car overlapped the space by two inches of one tyre.
South West Trains is now repainting some spaces to make them bigger - as Richard Jones reports.
Play video Last updated Mon 20 Feb 2017 Hampshire & Isle of Wight
